thread.title: Celebrate National Oyster Day and Support a Great Cause at Rusty Scupper
thread.title_full: Celebrate National Oyster Day and Support a Great Cause at Rusty Scupper

author: Ada Orie, Baltimore Nonprofit Examiner
title: Celebrate National Oyster Day and Support a Great Cause at Rusty Scupper
text: Celebrate National Oyster Day and Support a Great Cause at Rusty Scupper Use your key for the next article Eat Oysters and Support Oyster Recovery Partnership Photo by Ethan Miller/Getty Images for Vegas Uncork'd National Oyster Day is being observed on Wednesday August 5, 2015. You can celebrate National Oyster day and support a great cause when you dine at Rusty Scupper this week. Rusty Scupper is known for excellent food, a beautiful view of Baltimore and a great dining experience. Rusty Scupper is located at 402 Key Highway Baltimore, MD 21230. Rusty Scupper will donate twenty five cents from every oyster ordered until Friday August 7, 2015 to Oyster Recovery Partnership . Oyster Recovery Partnership was established in 1994 “to help manage and implement Maryland’s oyster restoration efforts.” You can learn more about the Oyster Recovery Partnership by clicking here . You can learn more about Rusty Scupper by clicking here . Have a wonderful time and make sure you enjoy your oysters. It does not matter what type of oysters you order this week, you will be supporting a great cause. Suggested Links
